title: Model Evolution Cycle Configuration
description: Defines the standard configuration structure for running an autonomous code evolution mission.

missionId.description: Unique identifier for the current mission instance (UUID v4).

creationTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the configuration was generated.

agiVersion.description: The Sovereign AGI version executing this mission.

targetArtifact.description: Path or identifier for the primary artifact (file/component) being evolved or analyzed.

evolutionSteps.description: Sequence of discrete, phase-gated evolutionary tasks to perform.

contextMetadata.description: Runtime context metadata necessary for execution (e.g., dependency versions, environmental factors).

stepId.description: Unique step identifier within the mission.

phase.description: The official phase name of the evolutionary task.

executorModule.description: The specific AGI module designated for execution (e.g., 'InferenceEngine_v8', 'CodeScaffolder').

objective.description: The explicit, measurable goal for the module to achieve in this step.
